head_html:
<style>
/* CC Culinary - Ye≈üil Header */
.navbar, .navbar-light, header.navbar {
    background-color: #38A160 !important;
    border-bottom: 3px solid #2d8050 !important;
}

.navbar-brand, .navbar-brand img {
    filter: brightness(0) invert(1) !important;
}

/* Header linkleri - BEYAZ */
.navbar .navbar-nav .nav-link,
.navbar .nav-link {
    color: white !important;
    font-weight: 600 !important;
    font-size: 16px !important;
    border-bottom: none !important;
    transition: all 0.2s ease !important;
}

.navbar .nav-link:hover {
    color: #e8f5e9 !important;
    text-decoration: none !important;
}

.navbar .nav-link.active {
    color: white !important;
}

.navbar-collapse {
    justify-content: center !important;
}

.navbar-nav {
    margin: 0 auto !important;
}

.navbar .dropdown-menu {
    display: none !important;
}

.navbar .dropdown.show .dropdown-menu {
    display: block !important;
    background: white !important;
}

.navbar .dropdown-toggle {
    color: white !important;
}

/* SEPET ƒ∞KONU - TURUNCU */
header.navbar li.shopping-cart a svg,
.navbar .shopping-cart svg.icon,
.navbar .cart-icon svg.icon,
.shopping-cart .nav-link svg {
    color: #ff6b35 !important;
}

.shopping-cart:hover svg {
    transform: scale(1.15) !important;
}

.badge-primary,
.shopping-badge,
#cart-count {
    background-color: #ff6b35 !important;
}

/* Ye≈üil Scrollbar */
::-webkit-scrollbar {
    width: 12px;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    background: #f1f1f1;
    border-radius: 10px;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    background: #38A160;
    border-radius: 10px;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
    background: #2d8050;
}

* {
    scrollbar-width: thin;
    scrollbar-color: #38A160 #f1f1f1;
}

/* SCROLL-TO-TOP BUTONU - YE≈ûƒ∞L */
button#scroll-to-top {
    position: fixed;
    bottom: 30px;
    right: 30px;
    width: 55px;
    height: 55px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background-color: #38A160;
    border: none;
    color: white;
    font-size: 24px;
    cursor: pointer;
    z-index: 10000;
    box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(56, 161, 96, 0.4);
    opacity: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
}

button#scroll-to-top.visible {
    opacity: 1;
    visibility: visible;
}

button#scroll-to-top:hover {
    background-color: #2d8050;
    transform: translateY(-5px);
    box-shadow: 0 6px 16px rgba(56, 161, 96, 0.6);
}

button#scroll-to-top svg {
    width: 24px;
    height: 24px;
    vertical-align: middle;
}


/* √úr√ºn Sayƒ±sƒ± - SAƒû √úSTE ta≈üƒ± */
.toolbar.d-flex {
    display: flex !important;
    flex-wrap: nowrap !important;
    align-items: center !important;
}

.toolbar .product-count-display {
    order: 999 !important;
    margin-left: auto !important;
}

.toolbar .search-bar {
    order: 10 !important;
    flex: 1 !important;
    max-width: 400px !important;
}

.toolbar .sort-by-group {
    order: 1 !important;
}

.toolbar .show-group {
    order: 2 !important;
}

.toolbar .view-toggler {
    order: 100 !important;
}

</style>

<script>
// Scroll-to-top butonu - Basitle≈ütirilmi≈ü
window.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // Butonu ekle
    var btn = document.createElement('button');
    btn.id = 'scroll-to-top';
    btn.innerHTML = '<svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="3"><polyline points="18 15 12 9 6 15"></polyline></svg>';
    btn.title = 'Ba≈üa D√∂n';
    document.body.appendChild(btn);
    
    // Scroll dinle
    window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {
        if (window.pageYOffset > 300) {
            btn.classList.add('visible');
        } else {
            btn.classList.remove('visible');
        }
    });
    
    // Tƒ±klama
    btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
        window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' });
    });
});
</script>
name: Website Settings
